title: How to view Verizon text messages - Quora

response.answer_text: Step 1 Go to the Verizon Wireless website and log in to your account. Enter your 10-digit mobile number or your selected user name and password. Step 2 Scroll over "Messaging" in the horizontal navigation bar. From the drop-down menu, select "Send Text Message." Step 3 Select "Check Text Status" on the vertical navigation bar from the "Send a Text Message" web page. Step 4 Direct text messages to your Verizon account by either selecting "Web" or "My Handset and Web." Click "Apply" to save changes. Step 5 Use the "Check Text Status" web page to view your messages sent and replies. Messages sent to you are located in the "Reply" section.

You can only view your text messages if you are using the message plus app on your phone. You have to log into your vzw acct online on a PC. If you are the act owner then you can view the text of the other people on your acct that uses message plus. Remember if a person is using an iPhone and I messaged, they will not show up because those go through Apples not any carrier.
